title: Flutter 2.10 arrives with stable support for building Windows apps
content:
Google has been working on Flutter for a few years now, with the goal to create the cross-platform software framework of developers’ dreams. Flutter can be used to build applications for Android, iOS, Linux, Windows, macOS, and even the web â€” all with a shared codebase and visual design. Flutter 2.10 is now available, which

The post Flutter 2.10 arrives with stable support for building Windows apps appeared first on xda-developers.
description: Flutter is already used by thousands of Android and iOS apps, but now Windows support has officially left beta status.
